title: IMS Learning Design-Based Online Language Education Operation Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic language proficiency and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Experience with structured learning operation processes using IMS LD in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze IMS LD-based learning scenarios and structure learning activities with 80% or higher accuracy in simulation environments
Learners can operate progress tracking and messaging systems for learner groups with 90% participation rates through VR simulations
Learners can fully implement 100% of summative assessment items using smartphone-based learning management tools in resource-constrained technical environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
